|expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Askey WLC032 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C502A |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=BTVOYAGER-XX |default_ssid_regex=^BTVOYAGER-[A-F0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:90:96 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.thinkbroadband.com/hardware/reviews/56-bt-2000.html Review on thinkbroadband.com] (internal photos) :"3015-000432" is silkscreened on the board by the phone line. :"3017-000380" is silkscreened on the the wireless module. :00:90:96 OUI ('''Askey'''), default SSID pattern appears to be '''BTVOYAGER-XX''' (where, per WiGLE, the XX is the last two hex digits of the wireless interface MAC w/ upper case letters)
This device is a '''Askey''' RTA040W. As such, the FCC ID of that device has been assigned to this entry.
